00009 #include "TTOverdrive.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 TTOverdrive::TTOverdrive(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00013         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels)
00014 {
00015         // register parameters
00016         registerParameter(TT("bypass"),         kTypeInt32,             &attrBypass,    (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTDegrade::setBypass);
00017         registerParameter(TT("bitdepth"),       kTypeInt32,             &attrBitdepth,  (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTDegrade::setBitdepth);
00018         registerParameter(TT("srRatio"),        kTypeFloat32,   &attrSrRatio);
00019 
00020         // register for notifications from the parent class so we can allocate memory as required
00021         registerMessage(TT("updateMaxNumChannels"), (TTMethod)&TTDCBlock::updateMaxNumChannels);
00022 
00023         setParameterValue(TT("maxNumChannels"), newMaxNumChannels);
00024         setParameterValue(TT("bypass"),                 kTTBoolNo);
00025         setParameterValue(TT("bitdepth"),               24);
00026         setParameterValue(TT("srRatio"),                1.0);
00027                 setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTDCBlock::processAudio);
00028 
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 TTOverdrive::~TTOverdrive()
00033 {
00034         free(output);
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 TTErr TTOverdrive::updateMaxNumChannels()
00039 {
00040         short i;
00041         
00042         output = (TTSampleValue*)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleValue) * maxNumChannels);
00043         for(i=0; i<maxNumChannels; i++)
00044                 output[i] = 0.0;                                // clear the values
00045         return kTTErrNone;
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 TTErr TTOverdrive::setBypass(TTValue& newValue)
00050 {
00051         attrBypass = newValue;
00052         if(attrBypass)
00053                 return setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTAudioObject::bypassProcess);
00054         else
00055                 return setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTDegrade::processAudio);
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 TTErr TTOverdrive::setBitdepth(TTValue& newValue)
00060 {
00061         attrBitdepth = clip((int)newValue, 1, 24);
00062         bitShift = 24 - attrBitdepth;
00063         return kTTErrNone;
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 TTErr TTOverdrive::processAudio(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00068 {
00069         short                   vs;
00070         TTSampleValue   *inSample,
00071                                         *outSample;
00072         short                   numchannels = TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(in, out);
00073         short                   channel;
00074         long                    l;
00075 
00076         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00077                 inSample = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00078                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00079                 vs = in.vs;
00080                 
00081                 while(vs--){
00082                         // SampeRate Reduction
00083                         accumulator += attrSrRatio;
00084                         if(accumulator >= 1.0){
00085                                 output[channel] = *inSample++;
00086                                 accumulator -= 1.0;
00087                         }
00088                 
00089                         // BitDepth Reduction
00090                         l = (long)(output[channel] * BIG_INT);                  // change float to long int
00091                         l >>= bitShift;                                                                 // shift away the least-significant bits
00092                         l <<= bitShift;                                                                 // shift back to the correct registers
00093                         *outSample++ = (float) l * ONE_OVER_BIG_INT;    // back to float
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         return kTTErrNone;
00097 }
